alert.note: Alert for City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR ISLE OF WIGHT...AND SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES...THE CITY OF FRANKLIN AND THE CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 218 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Whaleyville to near Boykins, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Holland around 230 PM EDT. Downtown Suffolk and Carrsville around 235 PM EDT. Windsor and Kings Fork around 245 PM EDT. Zuni around 255 PM EDT. Isle Of Wight around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Vicksville, Longview, Benns Church, Suffolk Airport, Worrell, Chuckatuck, Dory, Sunbeam, Lees Mill and Riverdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight
